item.description:
I have been slacking with my Portuguese lately so I am primarily creating this meetup for a selfish reason: to find conversation partners :) But this group is for beginners and advanced or native speakers alike.

We can work out the location but I would like to suggest either Central, Harvard, or Davis Square.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Lazy Sundays - Learn & practice Portuguese
